name: Steve's Spicy Shrimp Kabobs
author: MISSERSUE
summary: Jalapenos stuffed with marinated shrimp are wrapped in bacon and grilled.  My husband got this recipe from a friend. We were all dubious about my husband attempting any sort of cooking but this recipe is delicious and super easy. Perfect for a night where you want to whip something up quick and great served on a bed of yellow rice.
ingredients: 10  fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded
directions: Preheat a grill for high heat
Toss shrimp together with the lime juice, cilantro, and minced garlic
Place one shrimp inside each jalapeno half, and wrap with a slice of bacon
Thread onto skewers, 5 shrimp per skewer
Place skewers on the grill and cook for 4 to 5 minutes per side or until the bacon has browned and the shrimp are pink
